CVtreeMLE 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    Evaluating Causal Effects of Mixed Exposures using Data Adaptive Decision Trees and CV-TMLE

    Function reference

    All functions

    CVtreeMLE()
    Fit ensemble decision trees to a vector of exposures and use targeted maximum likelihood estimation to determine the average treatment effect in each leaf of best fitting tree
    NHANES_eurocim
    NHANES 2001-2002, POP Exposure on Telomere Length
    NIEHS_data_1
    Data 1 from the NIEHS mixtures workshop
    average_mixture_rules()
    Estimate the average rule. This is the rule that is the average across thresholds in folds and gives the lower and upper bounds
    bound_precision()
    Bound Precision
    bound_propensity()
    Bound Generalized Propensity Score
    calc_ate_estimates()
    Calculate the ATE and variance estimates
    calc_clever_covariate()
    Calculate the Clever Covariate for the TMLE step of the ATE
    calc_marginal_ate()
    Calculate the ATE for each rule found for individual mixture components.
    calc_marginal_rule_rmses()
    Calculate the mean RMSE in each marginal group
    calc_mixture_rule_rmses()
    Calculate the mean RMSE in each interaction group
    calc_mixtures_ate()
    Calculate the ATE for each mixture rule
    calc_v_fold_marginal_ate()
    Calculate the v-fold specifice ATE for each rule found for individual mixture components.
    calc_v_fold_mixtures_ate()
    Calculate the ATE for V-fold specific rules
    calculatePooledEstimate()
    Calculates the Inverse Variance Pooled Estimate Including Null Folds
    common_mixture_rules()
    Estimate the union rule. This is the rule that covers all observations across the folds.
    compute_meta_marg_results()
    Compute v-fold specific estimates and do a meta-analysis type pooled average ATE for each individual marginal rule.
    create_cv_folds()
    Stratified CV to insure balance (by one grouping variable, Y)
    create_rules()
    From HAL fit, create string based rules
    create_sls()
    Create default Super Learner estimators for the data adaptive and nuisance parameters used in CVtreeMLE
    est_comb_exposure()
    Estimate the expected outcome for the combination of marginal thresholds identified in the fold.
    est_marg_nuisance_params()
    Estimate nuisance parameters for each marginal mixture component
    est_mix_nuisance_params()
    Estimate nuisance parameters for each mixture interaction identified
    evaluate_marginal_rules()
    Evaluate mixture rules found during the rpart decision tree process
    evaluate_mixture_rules()
    Evaluate mixture rules found during the PRE process
    evaluate_rules_to_binary()
    Evaluate Rules to Binary Indicators
    filter_marginal_rules()
    Filter marginal rules across the folds for only those that have the same variables
    filter_mixture_rules()
    Filter mixture rules across the folds for only those that have the same variables and directions across all folds
    filter_rules()
    Filter data based on fold
    find_common_marginal_rules()
    Create a new rule based on observations that meet every rule across the folds for each mixture.
    fit_least_fav_submodel()
    Least Favorable Submodel
    fit_marg_rule_backfitting()
    Iteratively back-fit a Super Learner on marginal mixture components and covariates
    fit_min_ave_tree_algorithm()
    Fit minimum average tree
    fit_mix_rule_backfitting()
    Iteratively Backfit a Super Learner, h(x) = Y|W, and an Ensemble Decision Algorithm, g(x), Y|M_x until Convergence.
    groupby_fold() groupby_fold()
    Group by fold
    list_rules_party()
    Get rules from partykit object in rule fitting
    marginal_group_split()
    Group split by marginal variable
    meta_mix_results()
    Compute v-fold specific estimates and do a meta-analysis type pooled average ATE for mixture rules.
    plot_marginal_results()
    Create dot-whisker plots for the marginal results found
    pull_out_rule_vars()
    Pull rules out of results table of pre results
    round_rules()
    Round rules found for easier reading
    scale_to_original()
    Transform Values From The Unit Interval Back To Their Original Scale
    scale_to_unit()
    Transform values by scaling to the unit interval
    simulate_mixture_cube()
    Simulate a mixture cube to test CVtreeMLE against simulated ground-truth.
    v_fold_marginal_qgroup_split()
    v-fold marginal group split
    v_fold_mixture_group_split()
    v-fold group split

    Developed by David McCoy.
